metadata.title: Azure Stack Hub
metadata.subtitle: Bridge the Gap Between Your Data Center and the Cloud
metadata.description: The future isn't just cloud or on-premises - it's both. This course transforms you from someone who manages separate worlds into someone who creates seamless hybrid environments where Azure services run in your own data center. You'll master the technology that lets enterprises keep sensitive data on-premises while accessing cloud innovation - the skills that separate hybrid cloud architects from traditional IT administrators.
prerequisites: Experience with Azure IaaS and PaaS services
Understanding of networking and storage concepts
A vision for bridging traditional IT with cloud innovation

highlights: Run Azure services in your own data center
Bridge legacy systems with cloud innovation
Maintain compliance while accessing cloud benefits
Become the expert who modernizes enterprise IT

overview.summary: The most valuable IT professionals aren't those who choose sides in the cloud vs. on-premises debate - they're the ones who make both worlds work together seamlessly. This course teaches you the Azure Stack Hub skills that separate the hybrid cloud architects who enable digital transformation from those who get left behind. You'll learn to deploy Azure services in your data center, create consistent experiences across environments, and build solutions that respect regulatory requirements while delivering cloud benefits. By the end, you'll have the technical mastery to lead hybrid cloud initiatives and become the architect that enterprises depend on for their most critical workloads.
objectives: Deploy Azure Stack Hub environments that mirror cloud capabilities
Create hybrid networking solutions that connect disparate environments
Implement Azure-consistent services in on-premises data centers
Design disconnected scenarios for air-gapped and regulated environments
Build monitoring and management systems for hybrid infrastructure
Architect update and lifecycle management for complex hybrid deployments
Develop security frameworks that protect hybrid cloud assets
overview.targetAudience: This course is for the IT leaders ready to become hybrid cloud architects. Whether you're a data center administrator who wants to embrace cloud technologies, a cloud engineer who needs to understand on-premises constraints, or an enterprise architect who must balance innovation with compliance - if you want to build the bridge between traditional IT and cloud innovation, this course will give you the skills and mindset to become the hybrid cloud expert that modern enterprises desperately need.

faq.question: Do I need hardware for this course?
faq.answer: No, the course covers both physical deployment concepts and the Azure Stack Development Kit (ASDK) for hands-on practice without requiring physical hardware.

faq.question: Is Azure Stack Hub the same as Azure?
faq.answer: Azure Stack Hub provides Azure-consistent services but runs on-premises. Some services may have different versions or limitations compared to Azure public cloud.

faq.question: What PowerShell experience is required?
faq.answer: Basic PowerShell knowledge is required. The course covers Azure Stack Hub-specific PowerShell cmdlets and automation scripts.

faq.question: Can Azure Stack Hub work offline?
faq.answer: Yes, Azure Stack Hub supports disconnected scenarios, though some features like marketplace syndication require internet connectivity.
